body_html:
Fixed. I think it was because I was using PyCharm in the system environment. I had to set the variables in my system environment, not in ~/.bashrc:

sudo gedit /etc/environment

PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/bin:/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games"

LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64"

body:
Fixed. I think it was because I was using PyCharm in the system environment. I had to set the variables in my system environment, not in ~/.bashrc: 

sudo gedit /etc/environment

PATH="**/usr/local/cuda-9.0/bin:**/usr/local/sbin:/usr/local/bin:/usr/sbin:/usr/bin:/sbin:/bin:/usr/games:/usr/local/games"

LD_LIBRARY_PATH="/usr/local/cuda-9.0/lib64"
